title: Why is my phone saying that I don't have any SMS message connection and no mobile.connect.cloud line
content: Well my phone provider has done every thing that you can think of we tried a new sims card and that didn't work so they think that the phone is a peace of crap so there sending me another one through the mail but I want to ask you a question real fast something like this happen to me some years ago and it was that the pin park code had a issue the code got mest up and my phone was doing the same thing almost like it's doing right now so what do you think let's check and see if the pin park code got nocked off some how I don't know how to check it all I know that it got to do with the messages and your calling and receiving calls because I can't make a call or I can't receive any calls  and there is a cloud up in the left hand corner with you line going through it at a angle and when I tried to make a call all of my signal  and where its got the 4GB it all disappears and when I hang the phone up it returns can you please check that my pin park code is right because it happen to me before thank you for your time and consideration in this matter and I hope that we can get together soon and catch up on the phone so you can see what happens next thank you so much night
